original_title: Head-on crash between bus and lorry injures 22 people
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Twenty-two people were injured following an accident in Ambulgama, Hanwella along the Colombo – Avissawella main road on Friday (9) morning.
Sri Lanka Police said the accident was a result of a head-on collision between a lorry and a SLTB bus plying from Akkaraipattu to Colombo.
All the injured individuals were admitted to the Homagama and Nawagamuwa Hospital.
